item.title: CVE-2018-6289|2024-09-17T04:24:10.912Z -- kaspersky%20labs -- kaspersky%20secure%20mail%20gateway
item.description: Configuration file injection leading to Code Execution as Root in Kaspersky Secure Mail Gateway version 1.1.

item.description: Cross-site Request Forgery leading to Administrative account takeover in Kaspersky Secure Mail Gateway version 1.1.

item.title: CVE-2018-6291|2024-09-17T02:41:07.957Z -- kaspersky%20labs -- kaspersky%20secure%20mail%20gateway

item.title: CVE-2018-6290|2024-09-17T00:05:28.247Z -- kaspersky%20labs -- kaspersky%20secure%20mail%20gateway
item.description: Local Privilege Escalation in Kaspersky Secure Mail Gateway version 1.1.

item.title: CVE-2017-12823|2024-09-17T02:31:49.844Z -- kaspersky%20labs -- kaspersky%20embedded%20systems%20security
item.description: Kernel pool memory corruption in one of drivers in Kaspersky Embedded Systems Security version 1.2.0.300 leads to local privilege escalation.
